actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To amend title VII to authorize funds for the construction of a regional fine arts center and a child development complex at Saint Paul's College in Lawrenceville, Virginia.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education to provide financial assistance, upon application, to Saint Paul's College in Lawrenceville, Virginia, to construct: (1) a regional fine arts center; and (2) a child development center and single parent support system complex. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend title VII to authorize funds for the construction of a regional fine arts center and a child development complex at Saint Paul's College in Lawrenceville, Virginia.
